page.title: 01CROY.
page.content: Our block consists of a rural community with seven farms and two main housing areas namely the village of Croy and Tornagrain.There are also four forest plantations.The population of the village is approximately 270 and there are 66 children in the village school who are taught by 4 teachers. Unemployment is generally high but a majority of those employed work at the Arderseir oil rig fabrication yard. The area is not well served by public transport because a very high percentage of villagers have their own transport.There are 5 bus services which come through Croy.It is hard to stay out in Inverness for an evening because the last bus reaches Croy at 6.20pm.
